players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: remained silent.
Diana: "Let's discuss the case of Charlie and vote accordingly."
Bob: remained silent.
Diana: "I will investigate Alice next. We need to gather more information before making any accusations."
Bob: "I will remain silent. The detective knows I'm the mafioso, so revealing myself now would be foolish."
You: "I will remain silent. I don't have enough information to make an accusation or reveal myself as the villager."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested

players.name: Bob
